snippet.title: Live NRL 2017: North Queensland Cowboys v Melbourne Storm
snippet.content: Lucky break for the Cowboys here after a bomb is allowed to bounce - the second hop then fools Winterstein but from there it proceeds to continue trickling towards the dead ball line before eventually reaching it and out of nowhere, they have a seven tackle set. Smith hooks it wide. 4-0. Straight from the scrum the left winger gets the ball on the right, beats a couple and does just enough to get to the line before Coote forces him into touch. Now at the other end, Cronk puts a nothing kick over towards Feldt who makes an absolute meal of it! Scrum for the Storm 10m out. Feldt is over after a bomb went to ground, but it's called back for a knock-on against the home side. Nearly a dream start for the hosts! Game underway! No changes to the 17 but one swap: Asofa-Solomona starts, Glasby to the bench. Asiata and Fensom switch with the latter starting, Ben Hampton drops off the bench with Hoare coming in. Hey everyone, time for the second game of our double header as we catch our breath from what was a pulsating clash at the SCG, with the Bunnies stealing a win.
